RTCPeerConnectionGenerateCertificate.summary: The generateCertificate() static function of the interface creates an X.509 certificate and corresponding private key, returning a promise that resolves with the new once it's generated.

remarks.para:
-WebRTC API
-Web Crypto API
-Website security
-Web security
-Symmetric-key cryptography
-crypto

RTCPeerConnectionGenerateCertificate.returns: A promise which resolves to a new object containing a new key based on the specified options.
